channel.title: Why servers are beginning to fall apart

item.title: Why servers are beginning to fall apart
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

m.dog311:

I like how you say that they are “beginning” to fall apart. They have been getting shittier and shittier over the years. And to all of you who say it’s because this is Moparscape: Have you looked at any other site lately? It’s all the same everywhere.

I agree, but i believe they are peaking there very worst now.

Read full topic

item.title: Why servers are beginning to fall apart
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

[quote=“leacher1197, post:23, topic:293497”]I have a new good idea, A new mini game not releated to Runescape nor Classic, Why dosn’t anyone construct something with good coding like a chicken race mini game, You get turned into a chicken and Blame! you virse other people in a race as a chicken…
I tell ya its brinllient, well not really but still… First Idea anyone has came up with in long time.[/quote]
thats a good idea taking the ::pnpc idea…yes…tyvm, i have now copywrighted that idea

If you think my ranting is inappropriate move to another thread

item.title: Why servers are beginning to fall apart
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

At everyone that is sitting here ranting. Everyone that has programmed Runescape private servers started HERE. This is where it all began and it’s a great place for people to start up and get going. If you’d like to move to more advanced things, then move to a more advanced community.

Locus and r server are just the backup net for the people that fall through the cracks here.

Read full topic
item.source: Why servers are beginning to fall apart

item.title: Why servers are beginning to fall apart
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:19, topic:293497”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=388356.msg2903752#msg2903752 date=1249682869]
I like how you say that they are “beginning” to fall apart. They have been getting shittier and shittier over the years. And to all of you who say it’s because this is Moparscape: Have you looked at any other site lately? It’s all the same everywhere.
[/quote]Not really, Rune Server seems to be getting along better.
[hr]
To be honest, yeah, servers back in 2006 were much more fun, that’s why I’m running Fr33Sc4pk3 PKz renamed, it’s actually kind of fun, 20+ players and everyone loves it :)[/quote]
They still do everything the worst way possible and end up failing miserably.

item.title: Why servers are beginning to fall apart
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

If you don’t like it, leave.

If you want people to use something different, do it yourself.

But I agree with Luke, the servers we have nowadays are a piece of shit, and the majority of people who ‘program’ their server, cannot do it to any proper standard.

item.title: Why servers are beginning to fall apart
item.dc:creator: @Hextion Hextion
item.description:
@Hextion wrote:

[quote="`Lewk_, post:13, topic:293497"]I went on a delta just to mess with a kid. He announced in yell “HELP SOMEONE HELP ME FIX DIS ERROR” I’m like “I will.” So he meets me in game and hes like 'OMG INO U U FLAMMED ME IN MPSC" im like “I’m sure I did.” and hes like “k the error is cannot find symbol? What does that mean?? THERES NO SYMBOLS!!! HELP!! PLZZ ???” I’m like “/facepalm.”

Most of the people can’t even say they ‘Program’ a server, Or must I say ‘Code’. I agree, Private servers are a pile of junk now.[/quote]
Moparisthebest needs to prune his forum, I think then we can just cut down on all the junk.

Read full topic
item.source: Why servers are beginning to fall apart

item.title: Why servers are beginning to fall apart
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

I went on a delta just to mess with a kid. He announced in yell “HELP SOMEONE HELP ME FIX DIS ERROR” I’m like “I will.” So he meets me in game and hes like 'OMG INO U U FLAMMED ME IN MPSC" im like “I’m sure I did.” and hes like “k the error is cannot find symbol? What does that mean?? THERES NO SYMBOLS!!! HELP!! PLZZ ???” I’m like “/facepalm.”

Most of the people can’t even say they ‘Program’ a server, Or must I say ‘Code’. I agree, Private servers are a pile of junk now.

Read full topic

item.title: Why servers are beginning to fall apart
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Lin:

2006 servers were awesome and fun. Servers that go far and offer too much of a challenge become extremely boring, and you might as well just play RuneScape. You’d might as well make a shitty fun one that aims away from RuneScape.

Agreed. 2006 servers WERE AND STILL can be fun. Not all are, but some are. Roonscape for example.

And you should of noticed this a long time ago. Delta’s aren’t bad, the noobs who put no/nearly no work into their deltascape based servers made deltas have that reputation. I am using a clean Deltascape for my current server, and it isn’t nooby so far.

Read full topic

item.title: Why servers are beginning to fall apart
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

Lin:

I’ve come across this point and realized it long ago. But, I doubt it’s going to change until a group of people make it change. Have 10 people throw a 2006 server on the status list, and watch as they spread. As for the real shittiness of them, I don’t see that changing because it’s not always easy working with RS2D, etc…

yer but its better to work and make an awesome than a 2006 shit server
